types.name: The Void
types.logic: Absorbs all nearby light values silently.

types.name: Berserker
types.logic: High-speed collision; converts on impact.

types.name: Leech
types.logic: Slowly drains energy from neighbors over time.

types.name: Shadow
types.logic: Avoids Luminaries; targets Inert dots only.

types.name: Corruptor
types.logic: Turns Catalysts into Entropics.

types.name: Viral
types.logic: Spreads 'darkness' through chain reactions.

types.name: Nihilist
types.logic: Reduces the energy of any dot it touches to zero.

types.name: Specter
types.logic: Can pass through Inert dots without colliding.

types.name: Obsidian
types.logic: A heavy gravity well that pulls dots toward it.

types.name: Reaper
types.logic: Deletes dots instead of converting them.

types.name: The Sun
types.logic: Massive radius of healing/light influence.

types.name: Monk
types.logic: High resistance to conversion; stays static.

types.name: Beacon
types.logic: Actively seeks out Dark dots to convert them.

types.name: Protector
types.logic: Circles around clusters of Inert dots.

types.name: Messenger
types.logic: Fast mover; spreads light value across the map.

types.name: Aura
types.logic: Boosts the energy of nearby Light dots.

types.name: Prism
types.logic: Splits into two smaller Light dots if 'attacked'.

types.name: Guardian
types.logic: Aggressively repels Entropics from its zone.

types.name: Starlight
types.logic: Teleports to random locations to prevent total darkness.

types.name: Sage
types.logic: Increases empathy stats of nearby dots permanently.

types.name: Chaos
types.logic: Randomizes the personality of any dot it hits.

types.name: Glitch
types.logic: Momentarily breaks physics (teleports neighbors).

types.name: Mutant
types.logic: Changes faction based on whichever color is dominant.

types.name: Spark
types.logic: Explodes on contact, pushing all dots away.

types.name: Inverter
types.logic: Swaps the light/dark value of the target.

types.name: Shifter
types.logic: Mimics the personality of the last dot it touched.

types.name: Pulse
types.logic: Periodically sends a wave that resets velocities.

types.name: Drifter
types.logic: Follows the mouse/observer cursor.

types.name: Anomalous
types.logic: Ignores the borders of the simulation window.

types.name: Catalyst-X
types.logic: Forces an interaction regardless of dot types.

types.name: Citizen
types.logic: Standard behavior; easily influenced.

types.name: Wall
types.logic: Immovable; acts as a physical barrier.

types.name: Skeptic
types.logic: High resistance to both Light and Dark influence.

types.name: Follower
types.logic: Always moves toward the largest cluster of dots.

types.name: Static
types.logic: Resets its own position if moved too far.

types.name: Anchor
types.logic: Slows down any dot that enters its radius.

types.name: Vessel
types.logic: Can hold and transport Light value for others.

types.name: Drone
types.logic: Moves in perfectly straight lines until it hits a wall.

types.name: Buffer
types.logic: Neutralizes any interaction logic within its radius.

types.name: The Average
types.logic: The baseline for all mathematical comparisons.
